para.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:
“Health benefits plan” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 31-3131(4).
“Health insurer” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 31-3131(5).
“Provider” shall have the same meaning as provided in § 31-3131(7).

“Telehealth” means the delivery of healthcare services through the use of interactive audio, video, or other electronic media used for the purpose of diagnosis, consultation, or treatment; provided, that services delivered through email messages or facsimile transmissions are not included.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-126: § 3 of D.C. Law 22-126 provided that the change made to this section by § 2(a) of D.C. Law 22-126 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Applicability of D.C. Law 23-132: § 4 of D.C. Law 23-132 provided that the change made to this section by § 2(a) of D.C. Law 23-132 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
